CreateQuotaApplication.title: CreateQuotaApplication
CreateQuotaApplication.summary: Submits an application to increase a quota.

CreateQuotaApplicationsForTemplate.title: CreateQuotaApplicationsForTemplate
CreateQuotaApplicationsForTemplate.summary: Submits a quota increase application. After you add a quota item to a quota template, the system automatically submits quota applications only for new members of the resource directory. The quota values for existing members remain unchanged. If you want to increase the quota values of existing members, you can submit a quota application for the members by applying quota templates to the members. Only the management account of a resource directory can create multiple quota applications at a time.

CreateTemplateQuotaItem.title: CreateTemplateQuotaItem
CreateTemplateQuotaItem.summary: Creates a quota template by using the management account of a resource directory. After you create a quota template, if a member is added to the resource directory, the quota template automatically submits a quota increase request for the member. The quota values for existing members remain unchanged. You can use a quota template to apply for increases on multiple quotas at the same time. This automated approach improves the efficiency of quota management across your organization. Only the management account of a resource directory can create quota templates.

DeleteTemplateQuotaItem.title: DeleteTemplateQuotaItem
DeleteTemplateQuotaItem.summary: Deletes a quota template by using the management account of a resource directory. After you delete a quota template, if a member is added to the resource directory, the quota template no longer automatically submits a quota increase request for the member. Only the management account of a resource directory can delete quota templates.

GetProductQuota.title: GetProductQuota
GetProductQuota.summary: Queries the details of a quota of a cloud service.

GetProductQuotaDimension.title: GetProductQuotaDimension
GetProductQuotaDimension.summary: Queries the details of a quota dimension that is supported by an Alibaba Cloud service.

GetQuotaAlarm.title: GetQuotaAlarm
GetQuotaAlarm.summary: In this example, the operation is called to query the details of a quota alert. The details of the alert are returned. The query results include the alert ID, alert name, alert contact, and time when the quota alert was created.

GetQuotaApplication.title: GetQuotaApplication
GetQuotaApplication.summary: Queries the details about a specified application that is submitted to increase a quota.

GetQuotaApplicationApproval.title: GetQuotaApplicationApproval
GetQuotaApplicationApproval.summary: Queries the information about quota application approval, such as the average amount of time required for approval, whether approval reminders are supported, and the interval between two consecutive approval reminders.

GetQuotaTemplateServiceStatus.title: GetQuotaTemplateServiceStatus
GetQuotaTemplateServiceStatus.summary: Queries the status of a quota template.

ListDependentQuotas.title: ListDependentQuotas
ListDependentQuotas.summary: Queries the quotas on which a specified quota depends.

ListProductDimensionGroups.title: ListProductDimensionGroups
ListProductDimensionGroups.summary: Queries the dimension groups of an Alibaba Cloud service.

ListProductQuotaDimensions.title: ListProductQuotaDimensions
ListProductQuotaDimensions.summary: Queries the quota dimensions that are supported by the specified Alibaba Cloud service.

ListProductQuotas.title: ListProductQuotas
ListProductQuotas.summary: Queries the quotas of a specific Alibaba Cloud service.

ListProducts.title: ListProducts
ListProducts.summary: Queries the Alibaba Cloud services that support Quota Center.

ListQuotaApplicationTemplates.title: ListQuotaApplicationTemplates
ListQuotaApplicationTemplates.summary: Queries quota templates by using the management account of a resource directory.

ListQuotaApplications.title: ListQuotaApplications
ListQuotaApplications.summary: Queries the details of an application that is submitted to increase a quota.

ListQuotaApplicationsDetailForTemplate.title: ListQuotaApplicationsDetailForTemplate
ListQuotaApplicationsDetailForTemplate.summary: Queries the details of a quota increase application for member accounts in a resource directory.

ListQuotaApplicationsForTemplate.title: ListQuotaApplicationsForTemplate
ListQuotaApplicationsForTemplate.summary: Queries the application records of a quota template that is used to apply for quotas for member accounts.

ModifyQuotaTemplateServiceStatus.title: ModifyQuotaTemplateServiceStatus
ModifyQuotaTemplateServiceStatus.summary: Changes the status of a quota template. By default, the quota template is not configured. If the management account of a resource directory uses a quota template for the first time, you must enable the quota template. Only the management account of a resource directory can change the status of quota templates.

ModifyTemplateQuotaItem.title: ModifyTemplateQuotaItem
ModifyTemplateQuotaItem.summary: Modifies a quota template by using the management account of a resource directory. After you modify a quota template, the modification takes effect only for the members that are added to the resource directory by the management account. The quota values for existing members remain unchanged. Only the management account of a resource directory can be used to modify quota templates.

RemindQuotaApplicationApproval.title: RemindQuotaApplicationApproval
RemindQuotaApplicationApproval.summary: Reminds the approver of a quota application to review the application. This operation is applicable to quota applications that support the approval reminding feature.
